docs.title: CDN links for Localization and Culture for locale
docs.content:
## How to get the CDN links for Localization and Culture?

You can get the CDN links for Localization and Culture scripts in the following list based on the Culture Code.

### ar-AE

```html
<script src="http://cdn.boldreports.com/{{site.releaseversion}}/scripts/l10n/ej.localetexts.ar-AE.min.js"><script>
<script src="http://cdn.boldreports.com/{{site.releaseversion}}/scripts/i18n/ej.culture.ar-AE.min.js"><script>
```

<script src="http://cdn.boldreports.com/{{site.releaseversion}}/scripts/l10n/ej.localetexts.cs-CZ.min.js"><script>
<script src="http://cdn.boldreports.com/{{site.releaseversion}}/scripts/i18n/ej.culture.cs-CZ.min.js"><script>

docs.description: This documentation explains about CDN links for Localization and Culture scripts when using the Bold Reports Report viewer.
